pt.title: React Native Developer
pt.description:
Trabalhei como desenvolvedor Front-end React, React Native e no Back-end com Node.js para correções mais pontuais no BFF. 

Desenvolvi funcionalidades e correções no app da RD (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=br.com.drogaraia&hl=pt_BR) e Grupo DPSP (https://www.grupodpsp.com.br/) e desenvolvendo o sistema de frente de caixa das farmácias RD.

Usei as seguintes tecnologias e bibliotecas no meu dia a dia: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Typescript, React, React native, Node.js, GraphQL(Apollo Client), Next.js(SSR), Styled components, Tailwind e Testes unitários(Jest/RTL) e Micro frontend.

Também trabalhei com metodologias ágeis dentro do time. A que foi usada nessa experiência foi o Scrum com auxílio da ferramenta Jira.

pt.title: React Developer
pt.description:
Trabalhei como desenvolvedor Front-end usando React como principal biblioteca.

Desenvolvi e mantive o sistema da ouvidoria da coperativa financeira Sicredi (https://www.sicredi.com.br/home/) usando as seguintes tecnologias e bibliotecas: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Typescript, React, Zustand, Testes unitários(Jest), Styled Components, Tailwind, Strapi.

Também trabalhei com metodologias ágeis dentro da squad. A que foi usada nessa experiência foi uma junção de Kanban com Scrum, mais conhecido com SrumBan.

pt.title: React Developer
pt.description:
Fui desenvolvedor Front-end usando o React como biblioteca principal.

Trabalhei desenvolvendo, mantendo, corrigido e propondo soluções nos sitemas de e-commerce da drogaraia (https://www.drogaraia.com.br/) e drogasil (https://www.drogasil.com.br/), usando as seguintes tecnologias e bibliotecas: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Typescript, React, React Native, GraphQL(Apollo
Client), Next.js(SSR), Styled components e Testes unitários(Jest/RTL).

Também foi muito usado por mim e pela minha squad a metodologia Kanban para gerenciamento de tarefas e prazos.

pt.title: Desenvolvedor de front-end
pt.description:
Trabalhei como desenvolvedor Front end usando o React no sistema interno de caixa da coperativa financeira Sicredi(https://www.sicredi.com.br/home/).

Para entregar o trabalho, eu fiz o uso das tecnologias HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, Typescript, React, Web components e jQuery(no legado), fora as metodologias ágeis que usava um misto de Kanban com Scrum, prevalecendo a maioria dos aspectos do Kanban.

pt.title: Desenvolvedor de front-end
pt.description:
Trabalhei como desenvolvedor Front-end React focando em sistemas de e-commerce.

Em um dos projetos(https://voltzmotors.com/), eu fiz uso de HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, jQuery(para o legado), Sass, Less, Vtex(pra o e-commerce). Para outros projetos, foi usado uma stack de tecnologias parecida.

Dentre as metodologias ágeis aplicadas na empresa, a mais predominante era o Kanban, mas isso dependia do projeto em questão.

pt.title: Freelancer Desenvolvedor web front end
pt.description:
Trabalhei como desenvolvedor Frontend React freelancer mas também com foco em outras tecnologias.

Trabalhei em diversos projetos pequenos dentro da plataforma Upwork. Foi onde comecei a obter experiência de mercado. Usei diversas tecnologias e skills, entre elas: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Typescript, React, Gatsby, Next.js Redux, TDD, Jest, jQuery, Sass, Less, Wordpress, Woocommerce, Strapi, Vtex, Node.js.

Um dos projetos desenvolvidos: https://www.sharktankhub.com/

pt.title: Desenvolvedor web front end
pt.description:
Trabalhei como desenvolvedor Front end no projeto https://www.wine.com.br/, integrando a plataforma de e-commerce Oracle Cloud
Commerce. Nesse projeto usei as seguintes tecnologias: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Sass, Less, WordPress, OCC(Oracle Cloud
Commerce), HandleBars.

pt.title: Desenvolvedor web front end
pt.description: Trabalhei como desenvolvedor web com foco em Wordpress. Das tecnologias usadas incluem: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery, Sass, Less, Wordpress. Um dos projetos desenvolvidos foi http://leisecasalvavidas.com.br/

en.title: React Native Developer
en.description:
I worked as a Front-end React, React Native developer and on the Back-end with Node.js for more specific corrections in BFF.

I developed features and corrections in the RD app (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=br.com.drogaraia&hl=pt_BR) and Grupo DPSP (https://www.grupodpsp.com.br/) and developed the cash register system for RD pharmacies.

I used the following technologies and libraries in my day-to-day work: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Typescript, React, React native, Node.js, GraphQL (Apollo Client), Next.js (SSR), Styled components, Tailwind and Unit tests (Jest/RTL) and Micro frontend.

I also worked with agile methodologies within the team. The one used in this experience was Scrum with the help of the Jira tool.

en.title: React Developer
en.description:
I worked as a Front-end developer using React as the main library.

I developed and maintained the ombudsman system for the financial cooperative Sicredi (https://www.sicredi.com.br/home/) using the following technologies and libraries: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Typescript, React, Zustand, Unit Tests (Jest), Styled Components, Tailwind, Strapi.

I also worked with agile methodologies within the squad. The one used in this experience was a combination of Kanban and Scrum, better known as SrumBan.

en.title: React Developer
en.description:
I was a Front-end developer using React as the main library.

I worked developing, maintaining, correcting and proposing solutions in the e-commerce systems of drogaraia (https://www.drogaraia.com.br/) and drogasil (https://www.drogasil.com.br/), using the following technologies and libraries: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Typescript, React, React Native, GraphQL (Apollo Client), Next.js (SSR), Styled components and Unit tests (Jest/RTL).

I and my squad also used the Kanban methodology to manage tasks and deadlines.

en.title: Front-end developer
en.description:
I worked as a Front-end developer using React in the internal cash register system of the Sicredi financial cooperative (https://www.sicredi.com.br/home/).

To deliver the work, I used HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, Typescript, React, Web components and jQuery (in the legacy version), in addition to the agile methodologies that used a mix of Kanban and Scrum, with most aspects of Kanban prevailing.

en.title: Front End Developer
en.description:
I worked as a Front-end React developer focusing on e-commerce systems.

In one of the projects (https://voltzmotors.com/), I used HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, jQuery (for legacy), Sass, Less, Vtex (for e-commerce). For other projects, a similar technology stack was used.

Among the agile methodologies applied in the company, the most predominant was Kanban, but this depended on the project in question.

en.title: Freelancer Front end Developer
en.description:
I worked as a freelance Frontend React developer but also focused on other technologies.

I worked on several small projects within the Upwork platform. That's where I started to gain market experience. I used several technologies and skills, including: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Typescript, React, Gatsby, Next.js Redux, TDD, Jest, jQuery, Sass, Less, Wordpress, Woocommerce, Strapi, Vtex, Node.js.

One of the projects developed: https://www.sharktankhub.com/

en.title: Front end Developer
en.description:
I worked as a Front-end developer on the project https://www.wine.com.br/, integrating the Oracle Cloud
Commerce e-commerce platform. In this project I used the following technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Sass, Less, WordPress, OCC(Oracle Cloud
Commerce), HandleBars.

en.title: Front end Developer
en.description: I worked as a web developer with a focus on Wordpress. The technologies used include: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery, Sass, Less, Wordpress. One of the projects developed was http://leisecasalvavidas.com.br/
